family.name: recommendations
family.description:
Recommendations suggest additional offers that may interest shoppers. For example, if a shopper is viewing an iPod, you may want to display related offers such as iPod accessories. If the shopper is viewing offers in a Digital Camera [navigation node](navigations.md) then you can use recommendations to highlight a set of featured digital cameras in that node.
Recommendations are lists of offers, accessible through [offer](offers.md) for offer recommendations, [navigation nodes](navigations.md) for navigation recommendations, and the recommendations entry point for store recommendations. The recommendation-group-rel name reflects the type of recommendation. For example, when accessing an offer's recommendations a rel name could be "crosssells", which indicates the rel links to a list of "cross-sell" offers.
The *recommendation-group-rel* can be:
- `crosssell` - `upsell` - `warranty` - `accessory` - `replacement` - `recommendation`
